controller

Class ViewCreateUpdateMember

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ViewCreateUpdateMember

  • public class ViewCreateUpdateMember
extends java.lang.Object
    A controller class which handles and connects the Members class in the view package with the model classes and the Database. This controller class contains methods for retreiving, updating, and creating members from the database.
    Author:
    Mouayed Fakhreldin, Abdilrahman Duale, Genet Shiferaw

    • Method Detail

      • checkName

        public static void checkName(java.lang.String name,
                             Message message)
        Checks if the name the user inputs for creating a memaber is valid. Name can not be empty or null and can not contain too many spaces.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to be checked
        message - The validation message.

      • checkPersonalNumberCreate

        public static void checkPersonalNumberCreate(java.lang.String personalNumber,
                                             Message message)
        Checks if the personal number the user inputs for creating a memaber is valid. Personal number needs to be a 10 digit number.
        Parameters:
        personalNumber - The personal number to be checked
        message - The validation message.

      • checkPersonalNumber

        public static void checkPersonalNumber(java.lang.String personalNumber,
                                       Message message)
        Searches for a personal number in the database. If the personal number has been found, the Message will be validated.
        Parameters:
        personalNumber - The personal number to be searched for.
        message - The validation message.

      • checkNameUpdate

        public static void checkNameUpdate(java.lang.String name,
                                   Message message)
        Checks if the name the user inputs for updating a memaber's name is valid. Name can not be empty or null and can not contain too many spaces.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to be checked
        message - The validation message.

      • compactList

        public static java.lang.String compactList()
        Gets all the members from the database with the number of owned boats for each member.
        Returns:
        a compact list as a String

      • verboseList

        public static java.lang.String verboseList()
        Gets all the members from the database with details about the owned boats.
        Returns:
        a verbose list as a String

      • createMember

        public static boolean createMember(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String personalNumber)
        Creates a member and adds it to the database. Member will not be added to the database if the member's personal number already exists in the database (i.e no duplicate personal numbers).
        Parameters:
        name - The member's name
        personalNumber - The member's personal number
        Returns:
        true if the member has been created and added to the database, false otherwise.

      • updateName

        public static boolean updateName(java.lang.String personalNumber,
                                 java.lang.String newName)
        Updates a member' name by looking for a member by personal number.
        Parameters:
        personalNumber - The member's personal number
        newName - The member's new name
        Returns:
        true if the member's name has been updated successfully, false otherwise.

      • getMemberInfo

        public static java.lang.String getMemberInfo(java.lang.String personalNumber)
        Gets member's information including number of owned boats by searching through personal number.
        Parameters:
        personalNumber - Member's personal number
        Returns:
        The member's information as a String or null if the member has not been found.

      • getMemberName

        public static java.lang.String getMemberName(java.lang.String personalNumber)
        Gets a member's name by searching through the member's personal number
        Parameters:
        personalNumber - Member's personal number
        Returns:
        Member's name or null if the member has not been found.

      • deleteMember

        public static boolean deleteMember(java.lang.String personalNumber)
        Deletes a member from the database by searching through personal number
        Parameters:
        personalNumber - Member's personal number
        Returns:
        true if the member has been removed, false otherwise.
